entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:43PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Thunderstorms Expected Today... Thunderstorms have begun to develop North of Pedro Dome and will be capable of producing gusty winds, small hail about 0.50" or less in diameter, heavy rain and frequent lightning. Thunderstorms will drift south towards Fairbanks this evening.
